actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide monthly benefits for certain uninsured children living without parents.
short_title: Social Security Uninsured Children's Entitlement Act of 2005
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Uninsured Children's Entitlement Act of 2005 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to entitle certain uninsured children to new monthly benefits treated as monthly insurance benefits payable under the OASDI benefit program.

titles.title: Social Security Uninsured Children's Entitlement Act of 2005
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide monthly benefits for certain uninsured children living without parents.
